title: Video: How Taylor Swift's Endorsement Can Impact Kamala Harris
content: Global pop sensation Taylor Swift's support for Kamala Harris may have boosted the Democratic vice president's hopes of attracting young voters, but the question remains: Will the celebrity endorsement make a difference on Election Day?
summary: Global pop sensation Taylor Swift's support for Kamala Harris may have boosted the Democratic vice president's hopes of attracting young voters, but the question remains: Will the celebrity endorsement make a difference on Election Day?

title: Earth To Get A Mini-Moon For 2 Months? All You Need To Know
content: Earth's moon will soon have a temporary junior companion, an apparent mini moon revolving around our planet for about two months. In a rare event, an asteroid will be captured by Earth's gravity and will orbit the earth from Sept 29 to Nov 25.
summary: Earth's moon will soon have a temporary junior companion, an apparent mini moon revolving around our planet for about two months. In a rare event, an asteroid will be captured by Earth's gravity and will orbit the earth from Sept 29 to Nov 25.

title: Kamala Harris, Oprah Winfrey To Rally Support In Livestream Event Next Week
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris will join celebrity Oprah Winfrey in a livestream event next week to rally support in key battleground states in the Nov. 5 presidential election, Harris' campaign said.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris will join celebrity Oprah Winfrey in a livestream event next week to rally support in key battleground states in the Nov. 5 presidential election, Harris' campaign said.

title: 'Living Nostradamus' Claims 4 Prophecies Fulfilled, Predicts More Events
content: Athos Salome, the Brazilian parapsychologist known as the 'Living Nostradamus,' claims that his 2024 forecasts, including a looming asteroid threat, have come true.
summary: Athos Salome, the Brazilian parapsychologist known as the 'Living Nostradamus,' claims that his 2024 forecasts, including a looming asteroid threat, have come true.

title: How Boeing Strike Could Make The Global Jetliner Shortage Worse
content: Boeing's first strike in 16 years could further compound global shortages of jetliners that have been pushing up airfares and forcing airlines to keep older jets flying longer, industry executives and analysts said.
summary: Boeing's first strike in 16 years could further compound global shortages of jetliners that have been pushing up airfares and forcing airlines to keep older jets flying longer, industry executives and analysts said.

title: UK PM In US For Talks With Joe Biden On Ukraine Missile Use Against Russia
content: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer is meeting US President Joe Biden for talks on the next steps in supporting Ukraine, centring on whether to allow Western missiles to be used to hit targets in Russia.
summary: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer is meeting US President Joe Biden for talks on the next steps in supporting Ukraine, centring on whether to allow Western missiles to be used to hit targets in Russia.

title: Woman Sells Taylor Swift Tickets After Popstar Endorses Kamala Harris
content: A woman sold three Taylor Swift concert tickets, initially purchased for her daughter's 13th birthday, after being upset by Swift's endorsement of Kamala Harris.
summary: A woman sold three Taylor Swift concert tickets, initially purchased for her daughter's 13th birthday, after being upset by Swift's endorsement of Kamala Harris.

title: Russia Launches New Drones Barrage On Ukraine, Kyiv Shoots Down 72
content: Russia launched a new overnight drone attack on Kyiv and other Ukrainian cities on Saturday, prompting President Volodymyr Zelenskiy to issue a fresh appeal for more air defence and long-range capabilities.
summary: Russia launched a new overnight drone attack on Kyiv and other Ukrainian cities on Saturday, prompting President Volodymyr Zelenskiy to issue a fresh appeal for more air defence and long-range capabilities.

title: Iran Launches 2nd Satellite This Year Amid Concerns Raised By US, Europe
content: Iran has launched a research satellite into orbit with a rocket built by the Revolutionary Guards, state media reported.
summary: Iran has launched a research satellite into orbit with a rocket built by the Revolutionary Guards, state media reported.

title: Australia PM Hits Back At Elon Musk After His "Fascists" Quip
content: Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese hit back at Elon Musk on Saturday after the tech mogul called his government "fascists" for proposing laws that would fine social media giants for spreading misinformation.
summary: Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese hit back at Elon Musk on Saturday after the tech mogul called his government "fascists" for proposing laws that would fine social media giants for spreading misinformation.

title: Experts Warn Of Scammers Using 'Deepfakes' Of Famous Doctors On Social Media
content: Social media is being flooded by digitally created "deepfake" videos using the trusted identities of famous doctors to promote dangerous miracle cures for serious health problems, experts warn.
summary: Social media is being flooded by digitally created "deepfake" videos using the trusted identities of famous doctors to promote dangerous miracle cures for serious health problems, experts warn.

title: Opinion: Modi 3.0 Is Leaving Nothing To Chance With Southeast Asia
content: Modi 3.0 marks a significant evolution in India's engagement with Southeast Asia, driven by geopolitical imperatives and economic interests.
summary: Modi 3.0 marks a significant evolution in India's engagement with Southeast Asia, driven by geopolitical imperatives and economic interests.

title: Trump Calls Laura Loomer "A Free Spirit" After Her Racist Remark On Harris
content: Donald Trump has defended his ties with Laura Loomer, who has drawn fire from some of his Republican allies for embracing conspiracy theories and making racist comments, including against Kamala Harris.
summary: Donald Trump has defended his ties with Laura Loomer, who has drawn fire from some of his Republican allies for embracing conspiracy theories and making racist comments, including against Kamala Harris.

title: Indian Man Working With Russian Military Amid War With Ukraine Returns Home
content: Mohammed Sufiyan, 22, said he was promised a security-related job and not told about having to help the Russian troops in the war against Ukraine.
summary: Mohammed Sufiyan, 22, said he was promised a security-related job and not told about having to help the Russian troops in the war against Ukraine.

title: NASA Says 'New Record For Humanity' As 19 People Are Orbiting Earth
content: With the arrival of three more people to the International Space Station (ISS), the Earth's orbit is right now busier than it has ever been.
summary: With the arrival of three more people to the International Space Station (ISS), the Earth's orbit is right now busier than it has ever been.

title: Iranian Envoy Invites Indians, Says "Iran Is Safe" Amid Political Turmoil
content: Amid the tense situation in West Asia, Iranian Ambassador to India Iraj Elahi has said the tension between his country and Israel is "not new". He assured Indians and other tourists that "Iran is safe" to travel and urged them to explore Persia.
summary: Amid the tense situation in West Asia, Iranian Ambassador to India Iraj Elahi has said the tension between his country and Israel is "not new". He assured Indians and other tourists that "Iran is safe" to travel and urged them to explore Persia.

title: "My Happy Place. Love Being Here": Sunita Williams On Being Stuck In Space
content: Indian-origin astronaut Sunita Williams and her fellow NASA colleague Butch Wilmore, who took off aboard Boeing's Starliner on June 5, are stuck in space till February 2025.
summary: Indian-origin astronaut Sunita Williams and her fellow NASA colleague Butch Wilmore, who took off aboard Boeing's Starliner on June 5, are stuck in space till February 2025.

title: Sunita Williams "Could Have Returned" On Starliner. Why She Didn't
content: A US astronaut stuck on the International Space Station said Friday he believed Boeing's Starliner could have carried him home if more time had been available to work through the beleaguered spacecraft's issues.
summary: A US astronaut stuck on the International Space Station said Friday he believed Boeing's Starliner could have carried him home if more time had been available to work through the beleaguered spacecraft's issues.

title: Kamala Harris Says She Will Cut Degree Requirements For Certain Federal Job
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris said on Friday she will cut college degree requirements for certain federal jobs if elected president after the Nov. 5 elections in which she faces Republican former President Donald Trump.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris said on Friday she will cut college degree requirements for certain federal jobs if elected president after the Nov. 5 elections in which she faces Republican former President Donald Trump.

title: What We Know About US Vice President Kamala Harris' Gun
content: Democrat Vice President Kamala Harris said during Tuesday's debate with Republican Donald Trump that she owns a gun, a revelation that surprised some voters but carried a deliberate political message.
summary: Democrat Vice President Kamala Harris said during Tuesday's debate with Republican Donald Trump that she owns a gun, a revelation that surprised some voters but carried a deliberate political message.
